aspell.command:
cd $SOURCE_DIR
TARBALL=$(ls aspell*.tar.bz2)
DIRECTORY=$(tar tf $TARBALL | cut -d/ -f1 | uniq)

tar xf $TARBALL
cd $DIRECTORY

rust.command:
cat > /tmp/clearcargo.sh <<EOF
if [ -d $HOME/.cargo ]; then
	rm -rf $HOME/.cargo
fi
EOF
chmod a+x /tmp/clearcargo.sh
/tmp/clearcargo.sh
sed -i "s@$HOME@/root@g" /tmp/clearcargo.sh
sudo /tmp/clearcargo.sh
sudo rm -f /tmp/clearcargo.sh

lightdm.command:
sudo tee -a /etc/lightdm/lightdm-gtk-greeter.conf << EOF
[greeter]
xft-hintstyle = hintmedium
xft-antialias = true
xft-rgba = rgb
icon-theme-name = 'Flat Remix'
theme-name = Adapta-Nokto
background = /usr/share/backgrounds/aryalinux/default-lock-screen-wallpaper.jpeg
font-name = Source Sans Pro 11
EOF
